  In this workshop, you will learn the basic principles and methods of R Shiny.


## Content

+ Motivation of developing web-enabled applications
    + Basic principles of web applications
+ Introducing R Shiny
    + Getting to know Shiny
    + Architecture of Shiny
    + Building block of Shiny app
+ Advanced R Shiny 
    + Reactive feature of Shiny
    + Build interactive Shiny application by using plotly R
    + Build static, interactive and reactive geovisualisation application by using tmap
+ Managing R Shiny Project
    + The basic development cycle of creating apps
    + Debug errors in the codes 
    + Build complex Shiny application using module
    + Improve the productivity of Shiny applications development

## Workshop Slides and Hands-on Notes 

+ Introducing R Shiny slides in [html](../workshop/Shiny1/Shiny1.html) and [pdf](../workshop/Shiny1/Shiny1.pdf) formats

+ Managing R Shiny Project slides in [html](../workshop/Shiny2/Shiny2.html) and [pdf](../workshop/Shiny2/Shiny2.pdf) formats

View the three parts series of Shiny Tutorial at this [link](https://shiny.rstudio.com/tutorial/). 

## Readings
### Core Readings

* [Shiny reference guide](https://cran.r-project.org/web/packages/shiny/shiny.pdf) at CRAN.
* Hadley Wickham (2021) **Mastering Shiny**,  O’Reilly Media.  This is a highly recommended book.  You can find the online version with this [link](https://mastering-shiny.org/index.html).
* Paula Moraga (2020) **Geospatial Health Data: Modeling and Visualization with R-INLA and Shiny**, Chapman & Hall/CRC.   Chapter [13](https://www.paulamoraga.com/book-geospatial/sec-shiny.html), [14](https://www.paulamoraga.com/book-geospatial/sec-dashboardswithshiny.html) and [15](https://www.paulamoraga.com/book-geospatial/sec-shinyexample.html).  


### Additional references

* Colin Fay, Sébastien Rochette, Vincent Guyader, Cervan Girard (2020), **Engineering Production-Grade Shiny Apps**, Chapman & Hall.  You can find the online version with this [link](https://engineering-shiny.org/).
* [Outstanding User Interfaces with Shiny](https://unleash-shiny.rinterface.com/index.html).
* [How to Build a Shiny Application from Scratch](https://bookdown.org/hadrien/how_to_build_a_shiny_app_from_scratch/).
